distinct
from tbl_nav_info
order by ${orderByClause}

update tbl_nav_info set NO = #{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, URL = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUMMARY = #{summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAV_DESC = #{navDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CATEGORY_NO = #{categoryNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CATEGORY_NAME = #{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEIBO_URL = #{weiboUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROVINCE = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CITY = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEIXIN_ACCOUNT = #{weixinAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEIXIN_NAME = #{weixinName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ICON_URL = #{iconUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YX_EWM_URL = #{yxEwmUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WX_EWM_URL = #{wxEwmUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YIXIN_ACCOUNT = #{yixinAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YIXIN_NAME = #{yixinName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PRIORITY = #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CLICK_SUM = #{clickSum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select a.id,a.no,a.name,a.summary,a.icon_url,a.wx_ewm_url from tbl_nav_info a ,tbl_category_info cate where a.category_No=cate.no and a.status=1 and cate.parent_no = #{categoryNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by a.PRIORITY desc
select count(a.id) from tbl_nav_info a ,tbl_category_info cate where a.category_No=cate.no and a.status=1 and cate.parent_no = #{categoryNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
